title: Week 12 Recap, Chiefs Moving To Mahomes? (Football 11/27)
description:
Will Brinson, Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora break down everything you need to know from Week 12 in the NFL. First, Will and Jason discuss the Chiefs continued downfall and quarterback dilemma in KC (3:00), the Bills going back to Tyrod Taylor (9:00), constant bad football from the Browns (13:15), and the MVP race (17:45). As JLC hops on the train, Nick and Pete hop aboard to cover the rest of the action (19:00). The guys discuss Rams-Saints, playoff picture, if the Pats will cruise to the Super Bowl, if the Chargers could pose a threat, and much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
